name: Do You Know The Bible? Quiz | The Bible | 5 Questions

questions.text: When you put on the Armor of God, what does the helmet stand for?
questions.explanation:
Salvation.

	In Ephesians 6:17, the Salvation is part of the Armor of God, which talks about spiritual warfare.

questions.text: Complete the rest of this verse: 'My people are destroyed for ______'
questions.explanation:
lack of knowledge...

	In Hosea 4:6, it talks about how the people of Israel have no knowledge of the Lord, and what happens to people who do not seek him.

questions.text: Which of these is NOT a book that Paul wrote?
questions.explanation:
Revelation.

	Paul is estimated to have written more books in the New Testament than any other author. Paul used to persecute and jail people for believing in Jesus Christ.

questions.text: Who said: 'Truly this was the Son of God' when Jesus died on the cross?
questions.explanation:
Roman officer and soldiers.

	Matthew 27:54 after Jesus died on the cross, the soldiers realized that He was the Son of God and feared what they had done.

Golgotha.

	John 19:17 states that Jesus was crucified at Golgotha which is also called The Place of the Skull.
